data.text: @marcusalmost @StirringTrouble @jrogers01 The US is not being “invaded”. This is propaganda designed to feed your insecurities. Grow a pair and ask yourself why you are so afraid of people who you perceive to be different from yourself
@StirringTrouble You are such a lying asshole

@StirringTrouble @jrogers01 It simply isn’t. If you are ignorant or defensive of the Trump administration’s obvious indifference/antagonism twds civil rights then sadly you subscribe to the same White Supremacist doctrine. The Obama thing is just what you want to believe. It’s not actually what happened.
@StirringTrouble Think maybe she us a Misandrist, - don't they ever get tired if inventing stories about President Trump, who is nit one if your false plastic po,Politicians? ?
